snippet: French military forces began a fresh offensive on Monday against extremists in the northern Malian region of Gao, a French colonel said.
lead_paragraph: French military forces began a fresh offensive on Monday against extremists in the northern Malian region of Gao, a French colonel said.

headline.main: Mali: French Forces Begin New Offensive
